text: Dhanik Lal Mandal (30 March 1932 – 13 November 2022) was an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha from Jhanjharpur in Bihar, twice in 1977 and 1980. He was the member of Bihar Legislative Assembly (1967–74) and also speaker of Bihar Legislative Assembly, (1967–69).7th Lok Sabha Members Bioprofile He was the Governor of Haryana from 1990 to 1995.HARYANA LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY Haryana Legislative Assembly. ==References== Category:Governors of Rajasthan Category:Governors of Haryana Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Dhanik Lal Mandal
